attributes.action: Ban the sale & use of tobacco products for anyone born after 2008
attributes.background: There's no justification for anyone aged 10 yrs old or younger to be smoking. With all the campaigns to get people to stop smoking. Lets just ban smoking for anyone born on & after 2008. Nip it in the bud & prevent people from starting in the first place. Why treat the condition & ignore the cause?

rejection.details: It's already illegal for someone under the age of 18 to be sold tobacco so we're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
